intro: Psychotria batangana, commonly known as the Batangana Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It produces small, fleshy berries that are typically red when mature. Psychotria batangana is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical forests.
